Text: The movie itself is good but not a French speaker it is hard to find a matched subtitle at the moment. I tried more than 10 sub providers but I was stuck with time mismatched and bad translation.
Thanks for up. Does this have English subs?

Great sound and picture.
But the English subtitles are very bad.

They are either made using some kind of automatic translator, or written by someone who doesn't know how form sentences in English.

Some examples:

?It has a boy in school who is afraid of apples.?

?Do not do these guys.?

?This trainee is a bag.?

?Stop, is with cold hands.?
